scripts.prepare: host=$(node -e "const process = require('process');console.log(process.arch + '-' + process.platform)") && mkdir -p dist && skargo build -r --lib --manifest-path=../native/Skargo.toml --out-dir=./dist && mv dist/libskip-runtime-ts.so dist/libskip-runtime-ts-$host.so
scripts.build: host=$(node -e "const process = require('process');console.log(process.arch + '-' + process.platform)") && mkdir -p dist && skargo build -r --lib --manifest-path=../native/Skargo.toml --out-dir=./dist  && mv dist/libskip-runtime-ts.so dist/libskip-runtime-ts-$host.so && tsc && npm i
